per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.99;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);

per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;

per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=q1 = (sin(time)+1)/2;
per_frame_21=q2 = (cos(time*1.1)+1)/2;
per_frame_22=q3 = count;
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=zoom = 1 + 0.065*bass_att+0.05*bass;
per_frame_25=monitor=q3;
per_frame_26=q30=bass+mid+treb;
per_frame_27=q3=q30*2;
per_frame_28=q15=q1;
per_frame_29=q16=q2;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // PAINTERLY EFFECT:
warp_4=`    float2 uv2 = uv;
warp_5=`    const float mipbias = 0;
warp_6=`    float2 delta2 = texsize.zw*float2(1,1);
warp_7=`    float3 blurry_color = tex2D( sampler_main, uv2 + delta2 ).xyz;
warp_8=`    uv2.xy += (blurry_color.xy-0.37) * 0.03;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // sample previous frame
warp_11=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv2 ).xyz;
warp_12=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_13=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_14=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_15=`                      ).xyz*
warp_16=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_17=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_18=`                     );
warp_19=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.x += (noise9).x*1.5; 
warp_20=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.y -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_21=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.z *= (noise9).z*1.5; 
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`    // darken over time
warp_25=`    ret -= 0.004;
warp_26=`}
comp_1=`float2 uv_x, uv_y, uv_z, uv_echo;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*1.5;
comp_5=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv + float2(q15,0)*d) - GetPixel(uv-float2(q16,0)*d) );
comp_6=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv + float2(0,q16)*d) - GetPixel(uv-float2(0,q15)*d) );
comp_7=`
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    float2 uv_light1 = float2(1-q16,q15);
comp_10=`    float c = 8;
comp_11=`    float1 light1_dy = pow(length( uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*c - uv_light1),.2);
comp_12=`    float1 light1_dx = pow(length( uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*c - uv_light1),.2);
comp_13=`    float1 light1_dz = pow(length( uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*c - uv_light1),.2);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret = (1-float3(light1_dx,light1_dy,light1_dz))*GetPixel(uv)*4;
comp_17=`
comp_18=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_19=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_20=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_21=`                      ).xyz*
comp_22=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_23=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q30 
comp_24=`                     );
comp_25=`if(ret.x> q26*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q23*roam_sin.x)ret.x *= (noise9).x*1.5; 
comp_26=`if(ret.y> q25*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q22*roam_cos.x)ret.y += (noise9).y*1.5; 
comp_27=`if(ret.z> q24*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q21*roam_sin.y)ret.z -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_28=`float l = length(0.5 + (uv-0.5)*aspect.xy - uv_light1);
comp_29=`ret += saturate(1 - l*32);
comp_30=`
comp_31=`}
